description: Hisakawa Megumi is in charge of the elementary school 9`s http://anidb.net/ch27105 [Anti-Alien Squad]. Apparently she is the school counselor (she has her own room for this purpose); whether she gives normal lessons is unknown. http://anidb.net/ch27094 [Kasumi] is her favorite amongst the pilots while she considers http://anidb.net/ch27091 [Yuri] her problem child.
name: Hisakawa Megumi
